description:
cmd/godoc: better error message for missing index files

Fixes issue 5024.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/8222045/diff/4001/src/cmd/godoc/godoc.go
File src/cmd/godoc/godoc.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/8222045/diff/4001/src/cmd/godoc/godoc.go#newcode1521
src/cmd/godoc/godoc.go:1521: return fmt.Errorf("no index files matching %q", filenames)
maybe s/matching/match/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c7f65b7a16ca ***

cmd/godoc: better error message for missing index files

Fixes issue 5024.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
